other_tests.findings: Removal of one or two enlarged parathyroid glands; intraoperative PTH dropped significantly.
other_tests.changes_over_time: At 93-month median follow-up, PTH levels ranged between 56 and 182 ng/liter.

other_tests.findings: Patient treated with cinacalcet showed resolution of hypercalcemia.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Patient remained eucalcemic with normal PTH and no hypercalciuria at 10 years after surgery.

other_tests.findings: Bone density normal at various sites.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Pre- and postoperative scans showed maintained normal bone density.
